Foetal distress
Foetal distress indicates foetal hypoxia (lack of oxygen in the blood).
It can be diagnosed by:
/circle6 Abnormal FHR (<120 or >160 beats/minute)
/circle6 Meconium-stained amniotic fl  uid
/circle6 Check the FHR every 15 minutes.
/circle6 If the FHR remains below 120 or above 160 beats p
